job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Machine Learning Engineer

6 months contract

100% Remote


Qualifications:

  • Over 6 years of experience in Data and Analytics domain in a matrix environment, utilizing various SDLC methodologies
  • Experience with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AI/ML)
  • Exposure working within a Cloud environment and experience with any Cloud (AWS preferred).
  • Experience in DevOps workflow and tools such as Git, Kubernetes, Docker, CloudFormation and others; Especially Docker and Kubernetes
  • Ability to collaborate with leaders, users, Data scientist, Data Engineers, vendors, and other IT teams
  • Ability to work with multiple projects and workstreams at one time. Must be able to deliver results based upon project deadlines.
  • Willing to flex daily work schedule to allow for time-zone differences for global team communications
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills
